query:
SELECT '[[Datei:npc_' || npcs.name || '_0.png|zentriert|frameless|75px]]' AS Bild, name AS Name, name AS ID, gender AS Geschlecht, health AS Gesundheit, stamina AS Energie, hitdamage AS 'Treffer-
schaden', attackrange AS 'Angriffs-
reichweite', attackreaction AS 'Angriffs-
reaktion', walkspeed AS 'Geh-
geschwindigkeit', runspeed AS 'Lauf-
geschwindigkeit', herdmax AS 'Herde max', assetpath, '#Version#' || npcs.name AS 'Ab Version' FROM npcs WHERE type='Animal' order by name
